definitions.title: Def
definitions.body: [[שׁרר]] (√ of [[[שָׁרִיר]]], [[שְׁרִירוּת]], and perhaps of other words following; Oaram. [[שר]] be firm sound, Aram. [[שְׁרַר]] be firm, hard, 4ar be firm, consistent, substantial, truthful, 0a4ar strengthen confirm : Aram. and NH [[שָׁרִיר]] firm, hard ; 4ariyruwto0 firmness, strength, constancy).
